SELECT u.nick_name as nick_name, u.account as account, d.dot_name as dot_name, DATE_FORMAT(ar.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as create_time, COUNT(ar.create_user_code) as visit_num, COUNT(ar.update_time) as farewell_num
FROM zh_attend_records ar
LEFT JOIN zh_users u ON ar.create_user_name = u.nick_name LEFT JOIN zh_dot d ON ar.create_user_name = d.create_user_name
WHERE 1 =1
AND (ar.create_user_name = #{empCode} or ar.create_user_code = #{empCode})
AND (d.dot_num = #{siteCode} or d.dot_name = #{siteCode})
AND ar.create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}
GROUP BY u.nick_name HAVING visit_num >= 0 LIMIT #{limit},#{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT u.nick_name as nick_name, u.account as account, d.dot_name as dot_name, DATE_FORMAT(ar.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as create_time, COUNT(ar.create_user_code) as visit_num, COUNT(ar.update_time) as farewell_num
FROM zh_attend_records ar
LEFT JOIN zh_users u ON ar.create_user_name = u.nick_name LEFT JOIN zh_dot d ON ar.create_user_name = d.create_user_name
WHERE 1 =1
AND (ar.create_user_name = #{empCode} or ar.create_user_code = #{empCode})
AND (d.dot_num = #{siteCode} or d.dot_name = #{siteCode})
AND ar.create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}
GROUP BY u.nick_name HAVING visit_num >= 0) as tb

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT ar.visitors as visitors, u.nick_name as nick_name, u.account as account, d.dot_name as dot_name, d.dot_num as dot_num, ar.sign_address as sign_address, ar.attend_type_id as attend_type_id, ar.content as content, ar.sign_remark as sign_remark, ar.sign_time as sign_time, ar.create_time as create_time, ar.result as result, ar.end_time as end_time, ar.update_time as update_time, ar.url1 as url1, ar.url2 as url2
FROM zh_attend_records ar
LEFT JOIN zh_users u ON ar.create_user_name = u.nick_name
LEFT JOIN zh_dot d ON ar.create_user_name = d.create_user_name
WHERE 1 = 1
AND ar.create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}
AND u.account = #{account}
AND ar.update_time IS NULL) as coo
